about_me: Motivated and detail-oriented final-year student pursuing BTech in Cyber Security with a strong foundation in software development and data analytics. Proficient in various programming languages, back-end development, and web technologies. Experienced in data manipulation, analysis, and visualization using tools like Power BI. Demonstrated ability to manage and execute projects involving web scraping, database management, and cybersecurity frameworks. Adept in problem-solving and technical development, with a proven track record of effective teamwork and communication. Committed to leveraging my diverse skill set to provide innovative and secure solutions in software and data-driven environments.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Kattankulathur

responsibilities: Learned soft skills for team work and time management
Participated in a virtual internship, gaining hands-on experience in cybersecurity fundamentals.
Developed a strong understanding of cybersecurity frameworks, risk management, and mitigation strategies through practical applications in a virtual environment.
Gained hands-on experience in Python, Java, RDBMS, DevOps, and CyberSecurity through intensive training sessions.
Developed practical skills in software development, database management, and secure coding practices.

projects.name: Student Management System
details: Spearheaded the design and development of a comprehensive student management system using MySQL as the database backend.
Created database schema to store and manage student information, academic records, and administrative data, ensuring smooth data retrieval and updates.

projects.name: Netflix clone
details: Designed and developed the user interface (UI) for an Netflix clone, focusing on replicating key features like feed, profiles, and explore functionality.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure a smooth user experience, gaining valuable insights into web development and user interface design.

projects.name: Mass Mail Attack
details: The use of the Social-Engineering Toolkit (SET) for simulating mass mail campaigns reveals the potency of mass mailing attacks in manipulating user behavior.

The primary objectives are to assess the effectiveness of mass mailing as a social engineering technique, evaluate its impact on user awareness, and analyze the security implications associated with such simulated attacks.

projects.name: LokSabha Elections 2024
details: Web Scraping: Extracts data from the 2024 Indian elections page using Selenium and BeautifulSoup.
Data Processing: Cleans and organizes scraped data into a structured format.
Data Storage: Saves processed data locally as CSV files for further analysis.

projects.name: HR Analysis Dashboard
details: Data Extraction and Transformation: Extracted and transformed HR data from various sources, ensuring accuracy and consistency for analysis.
Advanced Data Visualization: Created interactive dashboards and reports in Power BI, highlighting key HR metrics and trends through intuitive visualizations.
Insightful Data Analysis: Conducted thorough analysis of HR KPIs, providing actionable insights for workforce optimization and strategic decision-making.
